name: Baldi's PlaceholderHouse
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Baldi Had A Great Idea!

His Idea Was To Change All Of The Walls To The Placeholder Ones

I think it was a great idea of making this mod!

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD: Move

Mouse: Look Around

Left Click: Pick Up Items, Open Doors

Right Click: Use Items

Shift: Run

Tab: Toggle Map

1,2,3,4,5: Select Items

Space: Look Behind You

THANKS:

Thank to Chris24XD. He Gave Me Link For The UABE
